description.value:
A shaman who selects the wood spirit has a skin tone similar to the coloration of trees in her home region. Her vibrant hair is fragrant and resembles leaves and blossoms.

Spirit Magic Spells: 

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.v05u8sl116ab2n9c]{Shillelagh} (1st), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.la7kuehewu85ybnt]{Barkskin} (2nd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jsvjsax2eabrlx8g]{Minor Creation} (wood items only) (3rd), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.818uuekrao87o57u]{Thorn Body} (4th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.6x6epf4g5wgzl1gh]{Tree Stride} (5th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.xmacjpo6tgm1xhnv]{Ironwood} (6th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.3fravqa4vrm4ygkr]{Transmute Metal to Wood} (7th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.cp5m19me647dojha]{Changestaff} (8th), 
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.9fd7mcoint902oyb]{Wooden Phalanx} (9th)

Spirit Animal: The shamanâ€™s spirit animal looks like a wooden figurine or a vaguely animal-shaped tree branch when it is motionless. The animal gains freeze as per the universal monster rule (Pathfinder RPG Bestiary 2 297).
